amendment.description: To require a specific authorization of Congress before the conduct of the design, development, or deployment of hit-to-kill ballistic missile defense interceptors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 765 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 765 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S6819-6821, S6823; text as modified: CR S6823; text: CR S6819) To require a specific authorization of Congress before the conduct of the design, development, or deployment of hit-to-kill ballistic missile defense interceptors.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 765 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 765 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
